precondition: The user's cursor is hovering over the 'Recycle Bin' icon located in the system tray on the right side of the taskbar.
expected_results: A context menu will appear, displaying a list of options related to the Recycle Bin.

precondition: The user has right-clicked on an empty area of the Windows desktop.
action: Click on the "Properties" option in the context menu.

expected_results: The content of the "Display Properties" window changes to display screen saver options and settings.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click the "Settings" button located to the right of the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: A new dialog box or window will open, allowing configuration of the selected screen saver's settings ("3D FlowerBox").

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the Display Properties window is open. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu is visible.
action: Click on the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu and select the "3D FlowerBox" option.
expected_results: The "3D FlowerBox" option should now be displayed in the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The desired screen saver, "3D FlowerBox", has been chosen.
action: Click the "Apply" button located at the bottom right of the "Display Properties" window.
expected_results: The selected screen saver settings, including the "3D FlowerBox" option, will be applied. The "Display Properties" window will remain open, allowing further modifications or navigation to other tabs like "Monitor power" for advanced power settings.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the "Display Properties" window is open. The "Monitor power" section is visible with the "Power..." button.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The "Settings for Home/Office Desk power scheme" section should be visible.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A list of time duration options will appear, allowing you to choose when the monitor should automatically turn off.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected. The 'System hibernates' option should have a dropdown menu.
action: Click on the dropdown menu for 'System hibernates' and select 'After 5 hours'.
expected_results: The 'System hibernates' option will now display 'After 5 hours', indicating the computer will hibernate after 5 hours of inactivity.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Power Schemes" tab is selected. The desired power scheme is selected, and the preferred settings for "Turn off monitor", "Turn off hard disks", "System standby", and "System hibernates" are configured.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window closes and the selected power settings are applied.

precondition: The "Display Properties" dialog box is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is active.
